tool_description: Optimizes knowledge base articles for search functionality by creating search indices, analyzing keyword density, and improving content discoverability through search engine optimization techniques.

article_content.description: Complete article content to index and optimize

article_tags.description: List of tags associated with the article

target_keywords.description: Specific keywords to optimize for in search

index_type.description: Type of indexing: Basic, Standard, or Advanced

error_messages: Empty content: Article content and title cannot be empty
No tags provided: At least one tag must be provided for proper indexing
Invalid index type: Must be one of Basic, Standard, or Advanced
Too many keywords: Maximum of 50 target keywords allowed
Content too short: Article must have at least 100 characters for effective indexing
usage: Provide article_content, article_title, and article_tags array. Optionally specify target_keywords for focused optimization and index_type for different levels of search optimization complexity.

keyword_density.description: Density scores for each identified keyword
